text: "Surrender" is a 1978 song by Cheap Trick. It was taken from their third studio album Heaven Tonight and was the first song to chart in the United States peaking at number 62. It found success in Japan where their previous singles I Want You to Want Me and Clock Strikes Ten. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Cheap Trick songs
title: Surrender (Cheap Trick song)
